tool_description: Organizes and catalogs photographic evidence with metadata extraction and quality assessment for wildlife documentation.

image_quality.description: Overall image quality: excellent, good, fair, poor

subject_clarity.description: Clarity of main subject: sharp, slightly_blurred, blurred, very_blurred

photo_datetime.description: Date and time photo was taken

camera_settings.description: Camera settings used (ISO, aperture, shutter speed)

subject_distance.description: Estimated distance to subject in meters (1 to 1000)

error_messages: Invalid image quality: Must be one of [excellent, good, fair, poor].
Invalid subject clarity: Must be one of [sharp, slightly_blurred, blurred, very_blurred].
Invalid datetime format: Use ISO 8601 format for photo_datetime.
Invalid subject distance: Must be between 1 and 1000 meters if specified.
usage: Specify image_quality, subject_clarity, and photo_datetime for basic cataloging. Add camera_settings and subject_distance for enhanced metadata documentation.

catalog_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to cataloged photo

usability_rating.description: Assessment of photo usability for identification purposes
